XXn2898u_001:18: yena vijñāyate puṃsāṃ svapneṣu ca śubhāśubhaṃ ||1 ||
XXn2898u_001:31: dvitīye tv aṣṭabhir māsai ( r māsais tri )
XXn2898u_001:39: caturbhis tu caturthe syāt phalaṃ suniyataṃ nṛṇāṃ |
XXn2898u_001:76: yas tu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ |
XXn2898u_001:80: suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ gāṃ ca kuṭumbaṃ tasya
XXn2898u_001:101: prāsādasthas tu yo bhuktvā samudrānte pibej
XXn2898u_001:106: api dāsakule jātaḥ so'pi rājā bhavi ( ṣyati ) ||8 ||
XXn2898u_001:123: yas tu paśyati svapnānte tāny eva labhate
XXn2898u_001:149: bahukoṭīśvaro cāpi kadā cij jāyate pumān ||11 ||
XXn2898u_001:156: astrair veṣṭayate yas tu gṛhaṃ vā nagarāṇi ca |
XXn2898u_001:168: upānahau ca cchattraṃ ca labdhvā yaḥ
XXn2898u_001:173: asiṃ ca nirmalaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tasya śrīs
XXn2898u_001:181: naukārūḍho vipannaḥ syāt tato'pi ca samuttaret |
XXn2898u_001:185: pravāsaṃ nirdiśet tasya śīghraṃ ca punar āgamaṃ ||14 ||
XXn2898u_001:205: dantā yasya viśīryante uttiṣṭhanti patanti ca |
XXn2898u_001:246: avagūhati yaḥ svapne tasya rātrir a ( pa ) ścimā ||19 ||
XXn2898u_001:257: avagūhati yaḥ svapne tasya śrī ( ḥ )
XXn2898u_001:266: rātrau suptas tu yaḥ kaś cij jalokābhis tu
XXn2898u_001:271: kanyā tu jāyate tasya nātra kāryavicāraṇā ||21 ||
XXn2898u_001:278: abhidravanti yaṃ svapne śṛṅgiṇo daṃṣṭriṇo'pi vā
XXn2898u_001:293: ādityamaṇḍalaṃ svapne candraṃ vā yadi paśyati |
XXn2898u_001:297: sa puṃsāṃ labhate koṣaṃ gṛhaṃ vā saṃprayacchati ||23 ||
XXn2898u_001:304: nigaḍair badhyate yas tu bāhupāśena vā punaḥ |
XXn2898u_001:308: putro vā jāyate tasya pratiṣṭhā vāpi
XXn2898u_001:329: raktaṃ pibati yaḥ svapne surām vāpi kathañcana |
XXn2898u_001:333: brāḥmaṇo labhate vidhyām itaro labhate dhanaṃ ||26 ||
XXn2898u_001:346: somapānaṃ bhavet tasya anyāṃ vā bhūtim
XXn2898u_001:354: dadhi dattvā bhavet prītiḥ godhūmaiś ca
XXn2898u_001:380: āsane śayane vāpi śārīre vāhane gṛhe |
